ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = "012700000001kI1", OR( ISPICKVAL(Action_to_be_Taken_After_Follow_Up__c, "Return to SPECIFIC person after each Follow Up call"), ISPICKVAL(Action_to_be_Taken_After_Follow_Up__c, "Return to SPECIFIC person once correspondence has posted/decisions been made")), ISBLANK(Agency_Follow_Up_Notes__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Agency Follow Up Notes are required
